price: 57. La récompense de l’autre monde est certes meilleure pour ceux qui auront cru et auront eu la piété.
arabic: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
